name: BitDAO
public_notice: On 17 July, BitDAO (BIT) will be converted to Mantle (MNT) tokens. For more information, please read here.

description.en: BitDAO is one of the world's largest DAOs (Decentralized Autonomous Organization). Our vision is open finance and a decentralized tokenized economy. ‌BitDAO is a protocol governed by BIT token holders. We welcome all individuals and communities to join us and contribute.
